mapper.select: select dr.component_id componentId, c.name component, dr.bridge_info_id positionId, bi.stake_or_truss_number position, dr.disease_id diseaseId, d.name disease from system.t_disease_record dr LEFT JOIN system.t_component c on dr.component_id = c.id LEFT JOIN system.t_component cc on cc.id = c.parent_id LEFT JOIN system.t_bridge_info bi on dr.bridge_info_id = bi.id LEFT JOIN system.t_disease d on dr.disease_id = d.id where (dr.task_id,dr.component_id,dr.bridge_info_id) = (#{taskId},#{componentId},#{positionId}) GROUP BY component_id,bridge_info_id,disease_id

select dr.disease_attribute_id diseaseAttributeId, da.value diseaseAttributeName, dr.content, dr.type from system.t_disease_record dr LEFT JOIN system.t_disease_attribute da on dr.disease_attribute_id = da.id where (dr.task_id,dr.component_id,dr.bridge_info_id,dr.disease_id) = (#{taskId},#{componentId},#{positionId},#{diseaseId}) and dr.type = 1
